properties.description:
updating for max functionality
Added new sources to capture application under process for multiple application.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	OecFileName as string ("FBHP_Eaas_Export_20230224074416.txt"),
	BlobContainer as string ("eaas-container"),
	BlobProcessingTemp as string ("oec/processing/temp"),
	BlobReject as string ("oec/reject"),
	Client as string ("Members Health Insurance Company")
}
source(output(
		ConfirmationNumber as string,
		SubmitDate as string,
		ContractID as string,
		PlanID as string,
		SegmentID as string,
		ApplicantTitle as string,
		ApplicantFirstName as string,
		ApplicantMiddleInitial as string,
		ApplicantLastName as string,
		ApplicantBirthDate as string,
		ApplicantGender as string,
		ApplicantAddress1 as string,
		ApplicantAddress2 as string,
		ApplicantAddress3 as string,
		ApplicantCity as string,
		ApplicantCounty as string,
		ApplicantState as string,
		ApplicantZip as string,
		ApplicantPhone as string,
		ApplicantEmailAddress as string,
		ApplicantMBI as string,
		ApplicantSSN as string,
		MailingAddress1 as string,
		MailingAddress2 as string,
		MailingAddress3 as string,
		MailingCity as string,
		MailingState as string,
		MailingZip as string,
		MedicarePartA as string,
		MedicarePartB as string,
		EmergencyContact as string,
		EmergencyPhone as string,
		EmergencyRelationship as string,
		PremiumDeducted as string,
		PremiumSource as string,
		OtherCoverage as string,
		OtherCoverageName as string,
		OtherCoverageID as string,
		LongTerm as string,
		LongTermName as string,
		LongTermAddress as string,
		LongTermPhone as string,
		AuthorizedRepName as string,
		AuthorizedRepAddress as string,
		AuthorizedRepCity as string,
		AuthorizedRepState as string,
		AuthorizedRepZip as string,
		AuthorizedRepPhone as string,
		AuthorizedRepRelationship as string,
		Language as string,
		ESRD as string,
		StateMedicaid as string,
		WorkStatus as string,
		PrimaryCarePhysician as string,
		OtherCoverageGroup as string,
		AgentID as string,
		SubmitTime as string,
		PartDSubAppInd as string,
		DeemedInd as string,
		SubsidyPercentage as string,
		DeemedReasonCode as string,
		LISCopayLevelID as string,
		DeemedCopayLevelID as string,
		PartDOptOutSwitch as string,
		SEPReasonCode as string,
		SEPCMSReasonCode as string,
		PremiumDirectPay as string,
		EnrollmentPlanYear as string,
		PremiumWithhold as string,
		SpouseWorkStatus as string,
		AccessibilityFormat as string,
		EmailOptIn as string,
		Race as string,
		Ethnicity as string,
		SubscriberID as string,
		ApplicationSource as string,
		CountyOffice as string,
		IntendedEffectiveDate as string,
		BrokerID as string,
		SignatureDate as string,
		BrokerValid as string,
		BrokerError as string,
		BrokerFirstName as string,
		BrokerLastName as string,
		BrokerAddressLine1 as string,
		BrokerAddressLine2 as string,
		BrokerCity as string,
		BrokerState as string,
		BrokerZipCode as string,
		AuthorizedRepFirstName as string,
		AuthorizedRepLastName as string,
		AuthorizedRepMiddleInt as string,
		PCPID as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: ($BlobContainer),
	folderPath: ($BlobProcessingTemp),
	fileName: ($OecFileName),
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	qutoChar: '\"') ~> Readblob
source(output(
		FILE_ID as long,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		FILE_CONTROL_NUMBER as string,
		FILE_CREATED_DATE as timestamp,
		FILE_RECEIVED_DATE as timestamp,
		TOTAL_RECORDS_REPORTED as long,
		TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED as long,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID as long,
		TARGET_SYSTEM_ID as long,
		CLIENT_FILE_TYPE_ID as integer,
		TOTAL_RECORDS_FAILED as long,
		HEADER_CODE as string,
		TOTAL_RECORDS_REJECTED as long,
		INSERT_DATETIME as timestamp,
		UID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> lkptxfile
source(output(
		APP_SOURCE_ID as integer,
		REF_APP_SOURCE_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT APP_SOURCE_ID, upper(APP_SOURCE_DESC) as REF_APP_SOURCE_DESC FROM dbo.REF_APP_SOURCE',
	format: 'query') ~> AppSourceId
source(output(
		ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_code as string,
		REF_ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_ID as integer,
		ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	query: 'SELECT ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_code, REF_ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_ID,UPPER(TRIM(ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_DESC)) AS ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_DESC FROM [dbo].[REF_ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT]',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> ACCESSIBLEFORMAt
source(output(
		Language_id as integer,
		Language_Desc as string,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID as long,
		Client_ID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("select R.Language_id,R.Language_Desc,C.CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,C.Client_ID from [dbo].[REF_LANGUAGES] R join [dbo].[CONFIG_CLIENT_LANGUAGE] C on R.Language_id= c.Language_id join [dbo].[CLIENT] CN ON C.CLIENT_ID=CN.CLIENT_ID  where CN.CLIENT_NAME = '"+$Client+"'"),
	format: 'query') ~> ClientLanguage
source(output(
		PREM_WITH_OPT_PARTCD_CODE as string,
		PREM_WITH_OPT_PARTCD_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select PREM_WITH_OPT_PARTCD_CODE,upper(Trim(PREM_WITH_OPT_PARTCD_DESC)) as PREM_WITH_OPT_PARTCD_DESC from [dbo].[REF_PREM_WITHHOLD_OPT_PARTS_CD]',
	format: 'query') ~> PrmWithHold
source(output(
		GLD_MBI as string,
		GLD_SUBSCRIBER_ID as string,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC as string,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	query: 'SELECT MBI AS GLD_MBI ,SUBSCRIBER_ID AS GLD_SUBSCRIBER_ID,GST.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC ,EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT FROM [dbo].[GOLD_MEMBER] GLD INNER JOIN [dbo].[GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS] GST ON GLD.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID=GST.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID\n',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> GoldMemberExt
SelLanguageCols derive(ApplicantBirthDate = toDate(trim(toString(ApplicantBirthDate)),'MMddyyyy'),
		FileNameFromSrc = $OecFileName,
		RELATIONSHIP_ID = 1,
		SubmitDate = toDate(trim(toString(SubmitDate)),'MMddyyyy'),
		IntendedEffectiveDate = toDate(trim(toString(IntendedEffectiveDate)),'MMddyyyy'),
		SubmitTime = toTimestamp(SubmitTime),
		APPLICATION_SOURCE = upper(ApplicationSource),
		GenderCode = case(
    trim(ApplicantGender) =='M', '1',
    trim(ApplicantGender) =='F', '2','0'

),
		MBI = trim(ApplicantMBI),
		CREATE_DATE = currentDate(),
		Update_Date = currentDate(),
		AccessableCode = upper(trim(AccessibilityFormat)),
		SignatureDate = toDate(trim(toString(SignatureDate)),'MMddyyyy'),
		PremiumWithhold = case( (upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='YES' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='Y')  &&  (upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='NO' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='N') ,upper(trim(PremiumWithhold)),
    (upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='NO' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='N')  &&  (upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='YES' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='Y') ,'D',
    (upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='NO' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDeducted))=='N')  &&  (upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='NO' ||  upper(trim(PremiumDirectPay))=='N') ,'N'
    ),
		PartDRxId = SubscriberID,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID = case(length(toString(CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID)) ==0, '1',toString(CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID))) ~> DerivedDates
Readblob select(mapColumn(
		ConfirmationNumber,
		SubmitDate,
		ContractID,
		PlanID,
		SegmentID,
		ApplicantTitle,
		ApplicantFirstName,
		ApplicantMiddleInitial,
		ApplicantLastName,
		ApplicantBirthDate,
		ApplicantGender,
		ApplicantAddress1,
		ApplicantAddress2,
		ApplicantAddress3,
		ApplicantCity,
		ApplicantCounty,
		ApplicantState,
		ApplicantZip,
		ApplicantPhone,
		ApplicantEmailAddress,
		ApplicantMBI,
		ApplicantSSN,
		MailingAddress1,
		MailingAddress2,
		MailingAddress3,
		MailingCity,
		MailingState,
		MailingZip,
		MedicarePartA,
		MedicarePartB,
		EmergencyContact,
		EmergencyPhone,
		EmergencyRelationship,
		PremiumDeducted,
		PremiumSource,
		OtherCoverage,
		OtherCoverageName,
		OtherCoverageID,
		LongTerm,
		LongTermName,
		LongTermAddress,
		LongTermPhone,
		AuthorizedRepName,
		AuthorizedRepAddress,
		AuthorizedRepCity,
		AuthorizedRepState,
		AuthorizedRepZip,
		AuthorizedRepPhone,
		AuthorizedRepRelationship,
		Language,
		ESRD,
		StateMedicaid,
		WorkStatus,
		PrimaryCarePhysician,
		OtherCoverageGroup,
		AgentID,
		SubmitTime,
		PartDSubAppInd,
		DeemedInd,
		SubsidyPercentage,
		DeemedReasonCode,
		LISCopayLevelID,
		DeemedCopayLevelID,
		PartDOptOutSwitch,
		SEPReasonCode,
		SEPCMSReasonCode,
		PremiumDirectPay,
		EnrollmentPlanYear,
		PremiumWithhold,
		SpouseWorkStatus,
		AccessibilityFormat,
		EmailOptIn,
		Race,
		Ethnicity,
		SubscriberID,
		ApplicationSource,
		CountyOffice,
		IntendedEffectiveDate,
		BrokerID,
		SignatureDate,
		BrokerValid,
		BrokerError,
		BrokerFirstName,
		BrokerLastName,
		BrokerAddressLine1,
		BrokerAddressLine2,
		BrokerCity,
		BrokerState,
		BrokerZipCode,
		AuthorizedRepFirstName,
		AuthorizedRepLastName,
		AuthorizedRepMiddleInt,
		PCPID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
lkptxfile select(mapColumn(
		FILE_ID,
		FILE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTxFile
DerivedPremiumWithHoldOnSSIandRRB, SelectTxFile lookup(FileNameFromSrc == FILE_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'both')~> LkpTxFileStage
LkpTxFileStage, AppSourceId lookup(APPLICATION_SOURCE == REF_APP_SOURCE_DESC,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'both')~> LkpAppSrcId
LkpAppSrcId, ACCESSIBLEFORMAt lookup(AccessableCode == ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_DESC,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'both')~> LkpAccessablilityFmt
LkpAccessablilityFmt select(mapColumn(
		ConfirmationNumber,
		SubmitDate,
		ContractID,
		PlanID,
		SegmentID,
		ApplicantTitle,
		ApplicantFirstName,
		ApplicantMiddleInitial,
		ApplicantLastName,
		ApplicantBirthDate,
		ApplicantGender,
		ApplicantAddress1,
		ApplicantAddress2,
		ApplicantAddress3,
		ApplicantCity,
		ApplicantCounty,
		ApplicantState,
		ApplicantZip,
		ApplicantPhone,
		ApplicantEmailAddress,
		ApplicantMBI,
		ApplicantSSN,
		MailingAddress1,
		MailingAddress2,
		MailingAddress3,
		MailingCity,
		MailingState,
		MailingZip,
		MedicarePartA,
		MedicarePartB,
		EmergencyContact,
		EmergencyPhone,
		EmergencyRelationship,
		PremiumDeducted,
		PremiumSource,
		OtherCoverage,
		OtherCoverageName,
		OtherCoverageID,
		LongTerm,
		LongTermName,
		LongTermAddress,
		LongTermPhone,
		AuthorizedRepName,
		AuthorizedRepAddress,
		AuthorizedRepCity,
		AuthorizedRepState,
		AuthorizedRepZip,
		AuthorizedRepPhone,
		AuthorizedRepRelationship,
		Language,
		StateMedicaid,
		WorkStatus,
		PrimaryCarePhysician,
		OtherCoverageGroup,
		AgentID,
		SubmitTime,
		PartDSubAppInd,
		DeemedInd,
		SubsidyPercentage,
		DeemedReasonCode,
		LISCopayLevelID,
		DeemedCopayLevelID,
		PartDOptOutSwitch,
		SEPReasonCode,
		SEPCMSReasonCode,
		PremiumDirectPay,
		EnrollmentPlanYear,
		PremiumWithhold,
		SpouseWorkStatus,
		EmailOptIn,
		SubscriberID,
		CountyOffice,
		IntendedEffectiveDate,
		BrokerID,
		FileNameFromSrc,
		RELATIONSHIP_ID,
		GenderCode,
		MBI,
		CREATE_DATE,
		Update_Date,
		FILE_ID,
		FILE_NAME,
		APP_SOURCE_ID,
		REF_ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_ID,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,
		ESRD,
		SignatureDate,
		PartDRxId,
		ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_code,
		APP_STATUS_ID,
		DefaultValue,
		Race,
		Ethnicity,
		BrokerValid,
		BrokerError,
		BrokerFirstName,
		BrokerLastName,
		BrokerAddressLine1,
		BrokerAddressLine2,
		BrokerCity,
		BrokerState,
		BrokerZipCode,
		AuthorizedRepFirstName,
		AuthorizedRepLastName,
		AuthorizedRepMiddleInt,
		PCPID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelTableFmt
ConditionalSplit1@MbiMaxSubmitDt, ClientLanguage join(case( trim(upper(Language))=='E' ||  trim(upper(Language))=='ENG' ||  trim(upper(Language))=='ENGLISH','ENGLISH',
      trim(upper(Language))=='SPANISH' || trim(upper(Language))=='S'|| trim(upper(Language))=='SPA','SPANISH',
      trim(upper(Language))=='OTHER' || trim(upper(Language))=='O' || trim(upper(Language))=='ZZZ','OTHER','ENGLISH') == Language_Desc,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClientLanguageData
JnGoldMember select(mapColumn(
		ConfirmationNumber,
		SubmitDate,
		ContractID,
		PlanID,
		SegmentID,
		ApplicantTitle,
		ApplicantFirstName,
		ApplicantMiddleInitial,
		ApplicantLastName,
		ApplicantBirthDate,
		ApplicantGender,
		ApplicantAddress1,
		ApplicantAddress2,
		ApplicantAddress3,
		ApplicantCity,
		ApplicantCounty,
		ApplicantState,
		ApplicantZip,
		ApplicantPhone,
		ApplicantEmailAddress,
		ApplicantMBI,
		ApplicantSSN,
		MailingAddress1,
		MailingAddress2,
		MailingAddress3,
		MailingCity,
		MailingState,
		MailingZip,
		MedicarePartA,
		MedicarePartB,
		EmergencyContact,
		EmergencyPhone,
		EmergencyRelationship,
		PremiumDeducted,
		PremiumSource,
		OtherCoverage,
		OtherCoverageName,
		OtherCoverageID,
		LongTerm,
		LongTermName,
		LongTermAddress,
		LongTermPhone,
		AuthorizedRepName,
		AuthorizedRepAddress,
		AuthorizedRepCity,
		AuthorizedRepState,
		AuthorizedRepZip,
		AuthorizedRepPhone,
		AuthorizedRepRelationship,
		Language,
		StateMedicaid,
		WorkStatus,
		PrimaryCarePhysician,
		OtherCoverageGroup,
		AgentID,
		SubmitTime,
		PartDSubAppInd,
		DeemedInd,
		SubsidyPercentage,
		DeemedReasonCode,
		LISCopayLevelID,
		DeemedCopayLevelID,
		PartDOptOutSwitch,
		SEPReasonCode,
		SEPCMSReasonCode,
		PremiumDirectPay,
		EnrollmentPlanYear,
		PremiumWithhold,
		SpouseWorkStatus,
		AccessibilityFormat,
		EmailOptIn,
		SubscriberID,
		ApplicationSource,
		CountyOffice,
		IntendedEffectiveDate,
		BrokerID,
		Language_id,
		Language_Desc,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,
		Client_ID,
		ESRD,
		SignatureDate,
		Race,
		Ethnicity,
		BrokerValid,
		BrokerError,
		BrokerFirstName,
		BrokerLastName,
		BrokerAddressLine1,
		BrokerAddressLine2,
		BrokerCity,
		BrokerState,
		BrokerZipCode,
		AuthorizedRepFirstName,
		AuthorizedRepLastName,
		AuthorizedRepMiddleInt,
		PCPID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelLanguageCols
DerivedDates derive(PremiumWithhold = case(trim(PremiumWithhold)=='RRB' ,'R',
trim(PremiumWithhold)=='SSI','S',PremiumWithhold),
		MedicarePartA = toDate(MedicarePartA,'MMddyyyy'),
		MedicarePartB = toDate(MedicarePartB,'MMddyyyy'),
		APP_STATUS_ID = 0,
		WorkStatus = case(equals(upper(trim(WorkStatus)),'YES'), 'Y', case(equals(upper(trim(WorkStatus)),'NO'), 'N', '')),
		DefaultValue = toString(null())) ~> DerivedPremiumWithHoldOnSSIandRRB
Select1 window(over(ApplicantMBI),
	desc(SubmitTime, true),
	Row_Num = rowNumber()) ~> WinMBI
WinMBI split(Row_Num != 2,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(MbiMaxSubmitDt, MultipleMBIs)
ClientLanguageData, GoldMemberExt join(SubscriberID == GLD_SUBSCRIBER_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'both')~> JnGoldMember
JnGoldMember filter(not(isNull(GLD_SUBSCRIBER_ID))) ~> filterGLDMBI
filterGLDMBI select(mapColumn(
		ApplicantMBI,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAppMBI
ConditionalSplit1@MultipleMBIs select(mapColumn(
		ApplicantMBI
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMBI
SelTableFmt alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdGM
SelTableFmt sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		APPLICATION_ID as long,
		CONFIRMATION_NUMBER as string,
		SUBMIT_DATE as timestamp,
		CONTRACT_ID as string,
		PLAN_ID as string,
		SEGMENT_ID as string,
		TITLE as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		DOB as timestamp,
		GENDER_CODE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		MBI as string,
		SSN as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		MAIL_CITY as string,
		MAIL_STATE as string,
		MAIL_ZIP as string,
		MEDICARE_PART_A as timestamp,
		MEDICARE_PART_B as timestamp,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT as string,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE as string,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP as string,
		PREMIUM_DEDUCTED as string,
		PREMIUM_SOURCE as string,
		OTHER_COVERAGE as string,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_NAME as string,
		LONG_TERM as string,
		LONG_TERM_NAME as string,
		LONG_TERM_ADDRESS as string,
		LONG_TERM_PHONE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_RELATIONSHIP_ID as string,
		ESRD as string,
		STATE_MEDICAID as string,
		WORK_STATUS as string,
		PCP as string,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_GROUP as string,
		AGENT_ID as string,
		SUBMIT_TIME as timestamp,
		PART_D_SUB_APP_IND as string,
		DEEMED_IND as string,
		SUBSIDY_PERCENTAGE as string,
		DEEMED_REASON_CODE as string,
		LIS_COPAY_LEVEL_ID as string,
		DEEMED_COPAY_LEVEL_ID as string,
		PART_D_OPT_OUT_SWITCH as string,
		PREMIUM_DIRECT_PAY as string,
		ENROLLMENT_PLAN_YEAR as string,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD as string,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS as string,
		ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID as string,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN as string,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID as string,
		APP_SOURCE_ID as integer,
		COUNTY_OFFICE as string,
		INTENDED_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		BROKER_ID as string,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID as long,
		FILE_ID as long,
		CLIENT_PRODUCT_ID as integer,
		APP_STATUS_ID as integer,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_ID as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE as string,
		SEP_REASON_CODE as string,
		SEP_CMS_REASON_CODE as string,
		INSERT_DATETIME as timestamp,
		UID as string,
		DENIAL_DATE as timestamp,
		DENIAL_REASON_ID as integer,
		SIGNATURE_DATE as timestamp,
		SEP_REASON_CODE_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_RX_ID as string,
		APP_SOURCE as string,
		ELECTION_CODE as string,
		APPLICATION_DATE as timestamp,
		RACE as string,
		ETHNICITY as string,
		BROKER_VALID as string,
		BROKER_ERROR as string,
		BROKER_FIRST_NAME as string,
		BROKER_LAST_NAME as string,
		BROKER_ADDRESSLINE1 as string,
		BROKER_ADDRESSLINE2 as string,
		BROKER_CITY as string,
		BROKER_STATE as string,
		BROKER_ZIP_CODE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_FIRST_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_LAST_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_MIDDLE_INT as string,
		PCPID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['update a  set a.TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED = b.TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED,\n     a.TOTAL_RECORDS_FAILED = b.TOTAL_RECORDS_FAILED  \n	 from dbo.TX_FILE a  inner join\n(\nselect (txfl.TOTAL_RECORDS_REPORTED - ld.TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED) as TOTAL_RECORDS_FAILED, ld.TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED, ld.file_id from [dbo].[TX_FILE] txfl\ninner join \n(select count(ap.file_id) as TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED,ap.file_id from [dbo].[TX_APPLICATION] ap\ninner join [dbo].[TX_FILE] fl on ap.file_id = fl.file_id\nwhere fl.TOTAL_RECORDS_LOADED is null \ngroup by ap.file_id )ld on txfl.file_id = ld.file_id)b on a.file_id = b.file_id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: ($BlobContainer),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($BlobReject),
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: true,
	mapColumn(
		CONFIRMATION_NUMBER = ConfirmationNumber,
		SUBMIT_DATE = SubmitDate,
		CONTRACT_ID = ContractID,
		PLAN_ID = PlanID,
		SEGMENT_ID = SegmentID,
		TITLE = ApplicantTitle,
		FIRST_NAME = ApplicantFirstName,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL = ApplicantMiddleInitial,
		LAST_NAME = ApplicantLastName,
		DOB = ApplicantBirthDate,
		GENDER_CODE = GenderCode,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 = ApplicantAddress1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 = ApplicantAddress2,
		ADDRESS_LINE3 = ApplicantAddress3,
		CITY = ApplicantCity,
		COUNTY = ApplicantCounty,
		STATE = ApplicantState,
		ZIP = ApplicantZip,
		PHONE = ApplicantPhone,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS = ApplicantEmailAddress,
		MBI,
		SSN = ApplicantSSN,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1 = MailingAddress1,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2 = MailingAddress2,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3 = MailingAddress3,
		MAIL_CITY = MailingCity,
		MAIL_STATE = MailingState,
		MAIL_ZIP = MailingZip,
		MEDICARE_PART_A = MedicarePartA,
		MEDICARE_PART_B = MedicarePartB,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT = EmergencyContact,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE = EmergencyPhone,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP = EmergencyRelationship,
		PREMIUM_DEDUCTED = PremiumDeducted,
		PREMIUM_SOURCE = PremiumSource,
		OTHER_COVERAGE = OtherCoverage,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_NAME = OtherCoverageName,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_ID = OtherCoverageID,
		LONG_TERM = LongTerm,
		LONG_TERM_NAME = LongTermName,
		LONG_TERM_ADDRESS = LongTermAddress,
		LONG_TERM_PHONE = LongTermPhone,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME = AuthorizedRepName,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS = AuthorizedRepAddress,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY = AuthorizedRepCity,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE = AuthorizedRepState,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP = AuthorizedRepZip,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE = AuthorizedRepPhone,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_RELATIONSHIP_ID = AuthorizedRepRelationship,
		ESRD,
		STATE_MEDICAID = StateMedicaid,
		WORK_STATUS = WorkStatus,
		PCP = PrimaryCarePhysician,
		OTHER_COVERAGE_GROUP = OtherCoverageGroup,
		AGENT_ID = AgentID,
		SUBMIT_TIME = SubmitTime,
		PART_D_SUB_APP_IND = PartDSubAppInd,
		DEEMED_IND = DeemedInd,
		SUBSIDY_PERCENTAGE = SubsidyPercentage,
		DEEMED_REASON_CODE = DeemedReasonCode,
		LIS_COPAY_LEVEL_ID = LISCopayLevelID,
		DEEMED_COPAY_LEVEL_ID = DeemedCopayLevelID,
		PART_D_OPT_OUT_SWITCH = PartDOptOutSwitch,
		SEP_REASON_CODE = SEPReasonCode,
		SEP_CMS_REASON_CODE = SEPCMSReasonCode,
		PREMIUM_DIRECT_PAY = PremiumDirectPay,
		ENROLLMENT_PLAN_YEAR = EnrollmentPlanYear,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD = PremiumWithhold,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS = SpouseWorkStatus,
		ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID = ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_code,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN = EmailOptIn,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID = SubscriberID,
		APP_SOURCE_ID,
		COUNTY_OFFICE = CountyOffice,
		INTENDED_EFFECTIVE_DATE = IntendedEffectiveDate,
		BROKER_ID = BrokerID,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,
		FILE_ID,
		SIGNATURE_DATE = SignatureDate,
		PART_D_RX_ID = PartDRxId,
		APP_STATUS_ID,
		RACE = Race,
		ETHNICITY = Ethnicity,
		BROKER_VALID = BrokerValid,
		BROKER_ERROR = BrokerError,
		BROKER_FIRST_NAME = BrokerFirstName,
		BROKER_LAST_NAME = BrokerLastName,
		BROKER_ADDRESSLINE1 = BrokerAddressLine1,
		BROKER_ADDRESSLINE2 = BrokerAddressLine2,
		BROKER_CITY = BrokerCity,
		BROKER_STATE = BrokerState,
		BROKER_ZIP_CODE = BrokerZipCode,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_FIRST_NAME = AuthorizedRepFirstName,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_LAST_NAME = AuthorizedRepLastName,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_MIDDLE_INT = AuthorizedRepMiddleInt,
		PCPID
	)) ~> TblTxApplicationLoad
selectAppMBI sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: ($BlobContainer),
	folderPath: ($BlobProcessingTemp),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ApplicationEnrollmentStatus_MBI.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkFile
SelectMBI sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: ($BlobContainer),
	folderPath: ($BlobProcessingTemp),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MULTIPLE_MBI.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MultipleMBIs
